lab-key-card1.description: Plastic card, which is used to opening doors

nucBattery.description: Power source for energy-magical devices, such as power armor

suitcase_vacation.name: Suitcase with Strikely's things
suitcase_vacation.description: Suitcase that contains all your things

blueprints2.name: Megaspell blueprints
blueprints2.description: A piece of paper overflowing with various schemes and formulas that are too complicated for you. Useless.

agent1Note.name: A drenched note
agent1Note.description: A rain-soaked note belonging to the stallion in a raincoat. The letters are clearly legible.

vacationNote.name: The order on granting leave
vacationNote.description: You had to work hard for this vacation

bellgatesPaper.name: Bellgates's letter
bellgatesPaper.description: A letter that somepony planted near your house. How did he figure out where you live?

firewood.name: Firewood
firewood.description: A small bundle of firewood. Enough to light a fireplace

revolver32.name: .32 revolver
revolver32.description: Not expensive weapon, shooting common cartridges, does not deal much damage

pistol10-silenced.name: .10 silenced pistol
pistol10-silenced.description: Perfect choise for ponies who like quiet kills

shotgun12.name: .12 shotgun
shotgun12.description: Deals a lot of damage in close range

shotgun20.name: .20 double-barrel
shotgun20.description: A sawn-off double-barreled shotgun that deals a large amount of damage at close range

sniper307.name: .307 sniper rifle
sniper307.description: How can a pony even use this scope?

rifle307.description: An inexpensive version of a rifle that shoots quite powerful cartridges at long distances

autorifle762.name: 7.62 auto rifle
autorifle762.description: A rifle that fires automatic fire at long ranges, deals not mane damage

ak47.name: 7.62 auto rifle
ak47.description: A rifle that fires automatic fire at meduim ranges, deals many damage

submachine10.name: .10 submachine gun
submachine10.description: Submachine gun for large caliber cartridges, that is hard to hold in mouth, when it shoots

laserPistol.name: Laser pistol
laserPistol.description: Energy pistol, firing with laser ray

plasmaPistol.name: Plasma pistol
plasmaPistol.description: Energy pistol, firing on short distance with plasma blob

laserRifle.name: Laser rifle
laserRifle.description: Energy rifle, firing with laser ray

ammo10.description: Pistol cartridges of a fairly large caliber

ammo12.description: Powerful weapon cartridges for expensive shotguns

ammo20.name: .20 ammo
ammo20.description: Powerful weapon cartridges for cheap shotguns

ammoEnergy.description: Ammunition for laser and plasma weapons

coat.name: Coat
coat.description: Coat of thick skin with a hat and a shirt. Any detective's best friend. Has great look and well protection.

stealth-armor.name: Stealth armor
stealth-armor.description: Combination on light armor, bandage, headrope and cute stealth-socks guarantees the safety.

private_uniform.name: Military uniform
private_uniform.description: Equestrian army private uniform. Seems like something is missing...

school_uniform.name: School uniform
school_uniform.description: You don't want to wear it at all

power-armor.name: Power armor
power-armor.description: Developed my MWT, turns earthponies to a walking tanks. Needs nuclear battery to work.

bow-ribbon.name: Bow
bow-ribbon.description: It does not have any properties, it is cheap. But it looks nice с:

collar.name: Collar
collar.description: Uncomfortable metal collar, strongly chafing the neck. I can't take it off without a key.

maffin.name: Maffin
maffin.description: Who wouldn't want a piece of something sweet?

pie.name: Apple Pie
pie.description: A masterpiece of culinary apple art

heal-potion.name: Heal potion
heal-potion.description: One of the most useful items for every pony since the declaration of war on zebras

mana-potion.name: Mana potion
mana-potion.description: Very useful for unicorns potion, that increases their magical abilities.

buck.name: Buck
buck.description: Pills, that temporarily increase strength and endurance. May cause addiction

dash.name: Dash
dash.description: Inhaler, that increases reaction speed. May cause addiction

hydra.name: Hydra
hydra.description: Increases cell regeneration. Some time after use, food may not restore health

med-x.name: Med-X
med-x.description: Intravenous painkiller. Temporarily removes the feeling of pain and reduces the damage received. May cause addiction

rage.name: Rage
rage.description: Intravenous drug, that increases aggression level. May cause addiction

mentats.name: Mentats
mentats.description: Adds color to the world and make you feel smarter than you really are. May cause addiction

stealth-buck.name: Stealth-buck
stealth-buck.description: A device developed on the basis of Zebra technologies that generates a stealth field when using (prototype)
